title: MOOC-Based Social Issue Awareness and Attitudinal Change Project

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, promoting attitude changes through real-time discussions and reflective journaling

learning_goals: Learners explain cognitive understanding of at least three global social issues (e.g., human rights, environment, animal welfare).
Learners express emotional empathetic responses to social issues with over 80% engagement through video case analysis.
Learners articulate their intention for behavioral change through reflective journaling at least twice weekly.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
